metadata.name: Transferring Files with Credential Data via Network Shares
metadata.comment: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 5145 AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\mimidrv')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\lsass')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\windows\\minidump\\')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\hiberfil')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\sqldmpr')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\sam')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\ntds.dit')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\security'))))

output.summary: Transferring files with well-known filenames (sensitive files with credential data) using network shares
